title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Memory Snow
synopsis: Subaru Natsuki finally gets to take a breather, but he does not waste any time as he prepares for a date with his beloved Emilia. He scouts the nearby village for the right dating spot, and with the help of the village children, he finds a wonderful location. With that, he is well prepared for his date!
